data.title: AAPL Stock Price, Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Apple, Inc. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and other variety of related
data.text:
Erik Ten Hag Wants Scott McTominay To Stay At Manchester United

Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has said he wants to keep Scott McTominay at Old Trafford for the coming season.

Paris Olympics 2024: ‘Fearless’ U.S. Going For Gold, Says Zimmerman

U.S. men’s soccer captain Walker Zimmerman said his “fearless” team has their eyes on the gold medal in Paris as they return to the Olympic stage after 16 years.

Harris Rises In Electoral Betting Markets But Bookmakers Still Favor Trump

North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper and Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro have emerged as the bettors' favorites to become the Democratic Vice Presidential candidate.

‘Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire’ Netflix Streaming Release — Here’s Everything You Need To Know

Everything you need to know about 'Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire' streaming release on Netflix.

Spain Aim To Be First World Champions In 88 Years To Win Olympic Gold

Spain will make their debut at the Olympic Football Tournament this week aiming to become the first-ever reigning women's World Cup champions to win a Gold medal.

Harris’ Support Surges: Potential Rivals Fall In Line Along With Key Biden Delegates—But Manchin Remains Wildcard

Several Democratic governors considered likely challengers to Harris publicly endorsed her on Sunday, but reports say Sen. Joe Manchin may be mulling a potential run against her.

Inquiry Set To Be Launched Into Costs For U.S. Leg Of T20 Cricket World Cup

An inquiry is set to examine whether there was a cost blowout for the U.S. leg of June's T20 World Cup, including the $30 million New York stadium.

Takeaways From OKC Thunder’s Summer League In Las Vegas

The Oklahoma City Thunder are done with NBA Summer League following a five-game stint in Las Vegas.

Retail Alert – Trump’s Party Is Looking At Your Supply Chain

Flying right in the center of the latest political storm, America’s retail community is on high alert for endangered supply chains.

‘House Of The Dragon’ Season 2, Episode 6 Recap And Review: The Flight Of The Dragonriders

New dragonriders emerge as House of the Dragon nears the end of Season 2.

Today’s ‘Wordle’ #1129 Hints, Clues And Answer For Monday, July 22nd

Looking for help with today's New York Times Wordle? Here are hints, clues and commentary to help you solve today's Wordle and sharpen your guessing game.

How Could The Rockets Win The Championship Next Season?

If the Rockets burst out of the games in 2024-2025, a trade deadline deal could boost their title odds.

As Armored Vehicles Run Out, Russian Brigades Are Adding Dirt Bike Training For Some New Troops

Don’t expect a little extra training to significantly extend bike troops’ life-expectancy.

Ana María Orozco Talks ‘Betty La Fea’ Impact, Sequel And Move To Streaming

From storyline to format, the continuation of Betty's life adapts to modern times.

Meet Canada’s Best Employers For Diversity 2024
